item.def:
Daewoo Hotel offers a variety of services and amenities including:
- Babysitting
- Barber/beauty shop
- Buffer breakfast
- Car Rental
- Coffee/tea in-room
- Game room
- Gift/newsstand
- Newspaper delivered to room, on request
- Newspaper in lobby
- Room service
- Safe deposit box
- Front desk
- Shoeshine
- Valet dry-cleaning
item.name: Overview
